publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-529.1 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Bill-As an amendment to motion (S2M-529) in the name of Peter Peacock, insert at end "but, in so doing, endorses the qualifications and recommendations referred to in paragraph 38 of the Education Committee's 2nd Report 2004 (Session 2), Stage 1 Report on Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Bill and calls on the Scottish Executive to address these during Stage 2 of the Bill."
